meanings: border (between/with), (특히 사람·차 등이 통행할 수 있는 지점) frontier (between/with), (가상의 경계선) boundary (between)

vlive.korean: [이 다리가 바로 국경] 진짜요? [This bridge is the border] Really? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.69
그 '국경없는 포차'인가? 맞나? Was it "Snack Stand Without Borders"? Is that right? 듣기 View video VIXX : 혁재구 막공🙏
vlive.english: Was it "Snack Stand Without Borders"? Is that right?

vlive.korean: [밀라노에서 차로 30분 정도 걸려요! 차로 국경을 넘었다는!] [It only takes 30 minutes by car from Milan! We drove across the border!] View video Apink : [CH.RONG] ITALY Vlog #05 MILANO
vlive.english: [It only takes 30 minutes by car from Milan! We drove across the border!]

vlive.korean: [8월 8일을 국경일로 어두워서 눈이 안 보여] 어두워서 눈이 안 보인다고? [It's too dark. I can't see] You can't see because it's too dark? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SEVENTEEN] 🐰19950808년 후에도 쿱스 생일 챙겨주려고 불로초 12첩 반상 차려먹는 사람의 모임(1/nnn) (HAPPPY S.COUPS DAY +1)
vlive.english: [It's too dark. I can't see] You can't see because it's too dark?

vlive.korean: 저게 국경이래. - 어디? That's the border. - Where? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 여자친구가 사랑한 유럽 EP.01 Part.4

examples.korean: national boundaries 듣기 Add to Wordbook 국경 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Troops patrolled the border day and night. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 군인들이 밤낮으로 국경에서 순찰을 돌았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Troops patrolled the border day and night. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The border will be policed by UN officials. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 국경은 유엔 직원들이 치안을 유지할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The border will be policed by UN officials. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The UN convoy was mined on its way to the border. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 유엔 수송대가 국경으로 향하던 길에 지뢰가 터졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The UN convoy was mined on its way to the border. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Villages along the border are regularly raided. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 국경을 따라 나 있는 마을들은 정기적으로 급습을 당한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Villages along the border are regularly raided. Add to Wordbook
